Constraint/Rule: if (FDbOperation*.featureDeleteDb) {featureMemoryBudget = true;featureINCompressor = true;FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FEvictor = true;}if (FConcurrency*.featureLatch) {featureVerifier = true;FDbOperation* = featureTruncateDb;featureTreeVisitor = true;FStatisticsFeatures = featureStatisticsLock;featureMemoryBudget = true;featureINCompressor = true;FConcurrency* = featureFSync;FPersistencyFeatures* = featureFileHandleCache;FEvictor = true;FDbOperation* = featureDeleteDb;FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FConcurrency* = featureCheckLeaks;}if (featureLoggingFine) {featureINCompressor = true;FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FEvictor = true;}if (!(!FLogging && !featureLoggingFinest)) {FConcurrency* = featureTransaction;}if (featureMemoryBudget) {FEvictor = true;FConcurrency* = featureLatch;}if (!(!FStatisticsFeatures.featureStatisticsLock && !FStatisticsFeatures.featureStatisticsTransaction)) {FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;}if (featureStatisticsEnvFSync) {FConcurrency* = featureFSync;}if (FStatisticsFeatures.featureStatisticsTransaction) {FConcurrency* = featureTransaction;}if (FConcurrency*.featureTransaction) {FDbOperation* = featureTruncateDb;FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FDbOperation* = featureDeleteDb;}
